content.rendered:
Directed by Prabhu Deva.

Written by Sahar Quaze.

Cast Akshay Kumar(Raftaar Singh). Amy Jackson(Sara Rana). Lara Dutta(Emily). Kay Kay Menon(Mark). Rati Agnihotri(Raftaar’s mother). Yograj Singh(Raftaar’s father). Pradeep Singh Rawat(Kirpal Singh). Anil Charanjeett(Pompy (as Anil Mange)). Arfi Lamba(Pappi). Kunal Kapoor(Mr. Rana- Sara’s Father). Murli Sharma(Boxer) . Alma Boiangiu(Singer). George Burcea(Right Hand). Ahran Chaudhary(Boxer (as Aaran Chaudhary)).Harry Josh. Durgesh Raje(Journalist at Mayor’s office). Kuldeep Sharma(Chacha of Akshay Kumar). Mahru Sheikh(Sara’s Mother). Harkirat Pal Singh(Tung Tung Song). Yuri Suri(Mark’s Father). Prabhu Deva(Man in Gents Urinal (uncredited)). Sunny Leone(Woman at Airport (uncredited))

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Aleem Allie. Nizam Allie. Mehboob Bawa. Akshay Gada. Kushal Gada. Sohaib Hasan. Noorie Hassan. Reshmaa Kadakia. Ravi Sarin. Mudit Vinayak. Ashvini Yardi.

Production Grazing Goat Pictures. Pen Movies.
